overview: 1. A cute tatami ghost that is said to bring good luck to the house. 2. A mysterious shape caught my eye while peeping into the private lives of residents through CCTV. 3. A bizarre voice heard while working on a record in a closed recording studio 4. A man who sat down in the same spot where a deceased regular customer always sat. someone is watching 5. A bar with a young and beautiful Madame. But every guest that comes in screams and runs away.
title: Kowabana-2
